verses.verse: Hear <WH8085> my voice, <WH6963> God, <WH430> in my complaint. <WH7879> Preserve <WH5341> my life <WH2416> from fear <WH6343> of the enemy. <WH341>
Hide <WH5641> me from the conspiracy <WH5475> of the wicked, <WH7489> from the noisy <WH7285> crowd of the ones doing <WH6466> evil; <WH205>
who sharpen <WH8150> their tongue <WH3956> like a sword, <WH2719> and aim <WH1869> their arrows, <WH2671> deadly <WH4751> words, <WH1697>
to shoot <WH3384> innocent <WH8535> men from ambushes. <WH4565> They shoot <WH3384> at him suddenly <WH6597> and fearlessly. <WH3372>
They encourage <WH2388> themselves in evil <WH7451> plans. <WH1697> They talk <WH5608> about laying <WH2934> snares <WH4170> secretly. <WH2934> They say, <WH559> "Who will see them? <WH7200>"
They plot <WH2664> injustice, <WH5766> saying, <WH8552> "We have made a perfect <WH2664> plan! <WH2665>" Surely man <WH376>'s mind <WH7130> and heart <WH7130> are cunning. <WH6013>
But God <WH430> will shoot <WH3384> at them. <WH6597> They will be suddenly struck <WH4347> down with an arrow. <WH2671>
Their own tongues <WH3956> shall ruin <WH3782> them. <WH7200> All who see them will shake their heads. <WH5074>
All mankind <WH120> shall be afraid. <WH3372> They shall declare <WH5046> the work <WH6467> of God, <WH430> and shall wisely ponder <WH7919> what he has done. <WH4639>
The righteous <WH6662> shall be glad <WH8055> in Yahweh, <WH3068> and shall take refuge <WH2620> in him. <WH3477> All the upright in heart <WH3820> shall praise him! <WH1984>
